class_notes: (Prior completion of PSYC 100, or 110, or 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology is highly recommended)
course_description: Examines the remarkable changes infants undergo during the first three years of life. Topics include: pregnancy, child birth, motor skills, perception, brain, memory, language, cognitive, social and emotional development.
